verbose_text: Furthermore, PRMT5 is recruited through interaction with Sp1 and activates the androgen receptor by symmetrically dimethylating H4R3, which significantly enhanced the growth of prostate xenograft tumors in mice XREF_BIBR.
evidence: PRMT5 is recruited through interaction with Sp1 and activates the androgen receptor by symmetrically dimethylating H4R3
